text: Gigerwaldsee is a reservoir in the municipality of Pfäfers, in the Canton of St. Gallen, Switzerland. The reservoir has a volume of 35.6 million m³ and a surface area of . The arch dam Gigerwald was completed in 1976. It has a height of 147 m. 250px ==See also== *List of lakes of Switzerland *List of mountain lakes of Switzerland ==External links== * Category:Lakes of the canton of St. Gallen Category:Reservoirs in Switzerland Category:Arch dams
title: Gigerwaldsee
